website_summaries.verdict: Powerful battery that provides a 25% longer lifespan than its generic equivalents.
pros: XR gives it that extra power you didn't know you were missing
Powers entire line of 9.6-volt tools, except Univolt tools
Very versatile as users can run multiple tools off the same item
cons: Users reported the charge not lasting as long as past models had

customer_reviews.title: Perfect drop-in replacement for your old Dewalt battery!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a replacement for an old battery that finally kicked the bucket after a few years of hard use. I was worried that since it's been so long, that Dewalt might have come up with a new system or something, but that wasn't the case. This is a perfect drop-in replacement! After charging, I was good to go and my drill was back to being the powerful tool it was when I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Kaizoku!

customer_reviews.title: Name Brand is the Best
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a comparable battery a little over a year ago and it didn't last. My original DeWalt lasted for many years, so I went back to an original. The charge lasts longer and I bet this battery will last longer than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette J. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Like other buyers said
customer_reviews.text: Like other buyers said, nothing like getting the genuine item! There are knock offs for the Dewalt batteries but they may or may not fit properly. As much as I have used the Dewalt Drill Motor for 21 years, I want the the new batteries to fit properly, so I sprang a few extra $$$ for the Dewalt brand name. By the way, the battery I am replacing is Dewalt and is 13 years old. It still works, but doesn't hold a charge very long. Very good products.
customer_reviews.author: LBJ

customer_reviews.title: Durable, efficient
customer_reviews.text: I've always stayed with DeWalt batteries rather than generic equivalents, and I've never been disappointed. I use this size drill and work light frequently, and I average about 5-7 years on a set of batteries. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: A. P.

customer_reviews.title: Three replacement batteries in 20 years.  Pretty darn good.
customer_reviews.text: I bought my 9.6v drill in 1995 or so. It's been wonderful and has its place, even amongst my bigger 18v and corded drills. I have bought these batteries in pairs over the years as the old ones wore out. This will make the third set I've bought since 1995. So, I've replaced the batteries 3 times in 20 years. So, around 5 years per battery (counting the original set). Pretty darn good, don't you think?
customer_reviews.author: R. Dunaway

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Not much to write. I've had the original battery for at least 5 years. While it can still be used, I needed spares so I didn't have to wait for the one battery to be charged. There is a noticeable difference in the new batteries. Has more power and lasts longer between charges.
customer_reviews.author: guitarman

customer_reviews.title: Nice having my 9.6v DeWalt drill operating again
customer_reviews.text: Geniune DeWalt battery. Nice having the 9.6v drill working again.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Simpson

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, the OEM is expensive, but it works and lasts much longer than the 3rd party batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Schnickiman

customer_reviews.title: Your Getting the Real Deal
customer_reviews.text: OEM is the way to go. Out perform the cheap clones by months and months. If you want a dependable DeWalt battery, buy the real deal. Straightforward, no BS deal. My preferred way to do business.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: DeWalt DW9061 XR 9.6 Volt Battery Pack
customer_reviews.text: There are two DeWalt replacement battery pack types that I know of. The one that has the XR behind the voltage is a hotter battery than the standard battery. The XR battery is about 1/2 inch longer and may weigh a tiny bit more but its worth it. I plan on buying a second XR battery. I have purchased two standard sets and they last about a year with me. Sometimes I use them a lot and sometimes they sit for a while betwen use. So far this battery is a gem. jet
customer_reviews.author: saxman

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect. It fit and I have a drill again.
customer_reviews.author: Wind

customer_reviews.title: Keeping my 20 year old DeWalt drill spinning.
customer_reviews.text: I wish they would make a lithium replacement and charger for these older drills that refuse to die.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fell

customer_reviews.title: good price
customer_reviews.text: This was much cheaper than i could find at Home Depot or DeWalt's web sife and "name brand" so it worked. the retail price is so high it is cheaper to buy a new drill. now i only have 1 drill as opposed to 2. Batteries Plus has similar ones but anytime i buy theirs it seems to either not fit right or not last as long as OEM.
customer_reviews.author: Tom P

customer_reviews.title: Good Replacement Battery
customer_reviews.text: Good for NiCad drills. I'm going to lithium after this one gives out. Lithium charge faster, last longer and weigh less.
customer_reviews.author: Noeule

customer_reviews.title: replacement battery
customer_reviews.text: It arrived intact and on time, and does what it is supposed to do. The price is a bit high compared to the price of the original drill kit. But I am told the reason they can sell the kits so cheap is that the original batteries are not as good as the replacement batteries. Maybe, but we'll see how long it holds a charge.
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement battery!
customer_reviews.text: Home Depot did not even have this battery in stock and if I ordered it, it would have cost over two times as much as I paid here on Amazon. The battery arrived and worked out of the packaging. I just tested to see if it worked and then had it fully charged in no time at all! I would definitely buy another one when this one goes out.
customer_reviews.author: VegasShopper

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these batteries to replace the old batteries because they would no longer hold a charge. These new ones charged quickly and hold a charge for several days. The drill that I use with these batteries is my the drill that I go to 80% of the time, so it gets used a lot. I'm very happy with these new batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Agnes W.

customer_reviews.title: highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize how weak the "old" battery was until I replaced it with this one. The drill was excellent quality when new; made in usa; with this battery it's as good as, maybe better than new. highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Lee from Danbury

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful. After charging it, I used it for over 3 hours and it was still going strong with tough jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Can you say rejuvenate?
customer_reviews.text: My batteries were shot on my 19 year old Dewalt drill (I have newer ones also), but wanted to get the 9.6v working again. An excellent way to rejuvenate an older but still functional drill to go with my others.
customer_reviews.author: Zekintha

customer_reviews.title: it worked like new.
customer_reviews.text: The part was an exact replacement for the original. After charging, it worked like new.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Pritchett

customer_reviews.title: better than the original battery
customer_reviews.text: this really works very well.... better than the original battery.... I have had it for well over a year with moderate use....no sign of losing power
customer_reviews.author: D. Michael

customer_reviews.title: He's very happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: ordered for a friend... He's very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Carlton Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased one of these. Put it on the charger and fully charged it. It enabled my drill to drill only ONE 3/32" diameter hole in a piece of cedar and had to be recharged. What a ripoff and a piece of junk. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H. Schultz

customer_reviews.title: DeWalt Quality
customer_reviews.text: As expected, these DeWalt batteries are fantastic! They hold a charge for months, and work for hours under severe stress. What else can I say? They are DeWalt quality. The originals lasted over 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: Paul T. Van Ryn

customer_reviews.title: His favorite drill's battery died and I purchased this one to ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly. I purchased as a gift to my father. His favorite drill's battery died and I purchased this one to replace it as no stores sells this battery anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Marisol Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic replacement - Powerful and longer lasting
customer_reviews.text: This replacement battery has brought my Dewalt drill back to life! The old batteries were losing power after ten minutes use. This new battery is delivering power for much longer than the originals, even when they were new. Charges fast on the old charger as well.
customer_reviews.author: outwest

customer_reviews.title: Great Replacement
customer_reviews.text: If you have to replace your battery this is the one to do it with. It has more power than the original and yes it may weigh a tiny bit more but worth it. It holds a charge longer then the ones the drill came with and when you are working on a house you need it to last.
customer_reviews.author: Fly Bye

customer_reviews.title: Battery replacement
customer_reviews.text: The replacement battery works well with my ten-year old Dewalt drill. My observation after a couple of short uses is that the capacity is no more or probably less than the original battery that came with the drill! I don't know if the XR label has much significance.
customer_reviews.author: Sahajanand

customer_reviews.title: OEM is always best
customer_reviews.text: I had my 9.6v Black&Decker power drill with old batteries for a while, so I forgot how powerful and capacious a new OEM battery could be. What a difference! Great product, just as one would expect from DeWalt.
customer_reviews.author: Nutmegger

customer_reviews.title: Need a new battery
customer_reviews.text: hard decision. My batteries were failing, wouldn't hold a charge. The cost of 2 batteries is just about what it cost for a new drill, case, and batteries. Decided to get the batteries, which did make the drill usable again.
customer_reviews.author: bsmith7167

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt Battery
customer_reviews.text: The battery worked well when i first got it but after a year it was pooped out and would not take much of a charge. This was my second replacement so i got a Bosch to replace the dewalt. Dewalt had two batteries that came with it one of them was no good.
customer_reviews.author: Picky Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Glad to find it here
customer_reviews.text: Replacement batteries are expensive and this voltage is hard to find. Works perfectly. Fit as described. Glad to find it here.
customer_reviews.author: HarmonS

customer_reviews.title: Good Battery, Too Expensive
customer_reviews.text: Way, way too expensive. Seems to work fine. Took a charge and held it.
customer_reviews.author: GBTtown

customer_reviews.title: Back in business.
customer_reviews.text: this battery pack was hard to find at stores. With this new one, I now have two battery packs as I do stuff around the house. It is very handy to use one while the other charges. It holds a charge for a good while.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: just what you would expect.
customer_reviews.text: These batterys hold up their charge very well and are powerful. I was so glad to find them.
customer_reviews.author: pat

customer_reviews.title: The power behind my Dewalt
customer_reviews.text: Great battery , although the drill gets all the credit , it isnt worth a dime with out a good battery and this one out does the originals by a long shot ! Getting ready to buy another for a back up !!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Anderson

customer_reviews.title: 100x better than the private brand knock-offs
customer_reviews.text: It holds it's charge much better than the cheaper items I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph B Dzialo

customer_reviews.title: DEWALT DW9061 XR
customer_reviews.text: Wow! It's like a new drill again. Price is awesome! Replaced two old and worn out DW9062 batteries with these and what a difference! Fit the drill and charger perfectly. Will have to see how long they last.
customer_reviews.author: John1

customer_reviews.title: Replacement
customer_reviews.text: My old DeWalt battery died from old age. Ordered replacement from Amazon and got what I needed at a good price. Received it in just a few days. Working well.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This replacement battery fits in my 9.6 volt Dewalt drill perfectly. It is a little heavier than the original but it is not that noticeable. Also it lasts a much longer time than the original did. I am very pleased with it and will be purchasing another in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mctheny

customer_reviews.title: No complain about it
customer_reviews.text: so far so good. I don't see any problem with it. It can hold the charge as I expected!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Daddy

customer_reviews.title: The item was received in very good condition and was exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: The item was received in very good condition and was exactly what I needed. The cost is reasonable and the arrival was prior to eta. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Ci Ci

customer_reviews.title: Great price on brand name battery
customer_reviews.text: Just got this yesterday. Hoping it will last a long time. Already had a charge of 10+ volts. Shipping was excellent! Came two days before receive date. Got a good price on it!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: give up the cadmium
customer_reviews.text: This battery is vastly superior to the old Dewalt batteries. Just no comparison. They hold their charge for a much longer time and charge really fast
customer_reviews.author: David Morning

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt battery pack
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the Dewalt battery pack. Reasonably priced and easy to use. Would recommend it highly to other people.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Spanik

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Battery did not last long despite me charging it once-a-week when not using it.
customer_reviews.author: Technonut

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. its telling me i need a bunch more words before accpt ing this re view. I am happy with the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Tweakit

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pleased that Amazon notes verified that this unit was compatible with my unit. This was my concern.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome battery!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my old (15 yrs) 9.6 volt battery for my drill with this one. It has more power to my old trusty drill that I am definitely impressed. This battery has revived my old drill!
customer_reviews.author: B. Breedlove

customer_reviews.title: Took charge and held charge.
customer_reviews.text: Took charge and held charge. Good value. Saved an old drill from the trash bin, Would buy replacement when current expire.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Perez

customer_reviews.title: For 9.6 drill
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I am not as drill technical, I did not know if xr would work on my 9,6 drill that did not say xr. It does and was cheaper than big boxes
customer_reviews.author: M. Doss

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about a NiCad battery to fill the number of word they want. It works and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works just fine, as it should since it's DeWalt.
customer_reviews.author: Rich V

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: It allows me to do my work around the house, easily. I don't have to hire anyone to do the small tasks
customer_reviews.author: A. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Basic Dewalt battery.
customer_reviews.text: Got his item to replace a 10 year old unit that has failed. It fits the driver and took a charge right away.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: The real Dewalt quality
customer_reviews.text: Pay a little bit more get the real Dewalt , more power last longer , you already know thats why you got a Dewalt drill in the first place , stick with quality !
customer_reviews.author: Steve in Tennessee

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It does the job. Cheaper than buying the whole new drill set
customer_reviews.author: Tony Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for two
customer_reviews.text: These are the extended runtime batteries. Since they are original equipment they hold a charge longer when in storage and run longer after a full charge.
customer_reviews.author: putertech

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt 9.6 Volt  Battery
customer_reviews.text: For my husband . uses all the time. works very well. Good product. The price was comparable with others i looked at.
customer_reviews.author: Martha  A . Sufficool

customer_reviews.title: Extended life battery
customer_reviews.text: Love DeWalt products. This battery pack lasts longer and has more power than the batteries that come with the drills. I own two 9.6 volt DeWalt drills and wouldn't trade them for anything else. My boyfriend wanted me to get a 12 or 18 volt for him and fought me on my decision to buy a second 9 volt. But buying a second 9 volt drill gave me more batteries that are compatible. Also the higher volt drills cost more and are heavier for me to handle. Now he borrows my drills for any of his projects and admits I was right. Huh, go figure!
customer_reviews.author: ngsetne

customer_reviews.title: which I consider a good name brand
customer_reviews.text: It is what it is, a Dewalt, which I consider a good name brand.
customer_reviews.author: debee

customer_reviews.title: DEWALT DW9061 XR 9.6-Volt 1.7-Amp NiCd Pod Style Battery Pack
customer_reviews.text: Much better battery than the original the drill came with. Charges quicker, lasts longer, seems to have more power than the original.
customer_reviews.author: P. A. Grimes

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement
customer_reviews.text: The battery was the right price and was a good fit for my...DeWalt drill. The drill runs like new again (was starting to lose its power).
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product - received in timely manner. Very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: betty

customer_reviews.title: Lasted only 5 months.
customer_reviews.text: Original Dewalt battery still going going strong after 18 years. This one failed after 5 months. Return policy didn't allow for replacement or refund.
customer_reviews.author: Greg R.

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt DW9061XR 9.6 volt battery
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with the short time it took to receive the battery and charged it up and worked great. I would recomend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Darrel

customer_reviews.title: Birthday gift for  Hubby.
customer_reviews.text: My husband ruined the battery on his drill in the pool when doing repairs. Yes, he got it wet. The drill is 10 years old and we did not think we could get a replacement battery, but the one we ordered and received is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: GGnana

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: This product met all my expectations and beyond. I would recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: Amazon delivery service -Dewalt DW 9061 XR battery
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two 2 batteries over the internet late in the evening, June 30 and I was expecting to receive the shipment late next week because of the pending July 4 holiday. I was surprised that I received them on July 4! Excellent service and the batteries came in their original plastic cases. The box that the batteries came in was well packaged and cushioned. Thank you for the excellent service.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Jung

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It really made my 20 year old drill work like brand new. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Battery
customer_reviews.text: This is my second XR battery.I bought the first one several years ago when the originals wouldn't hold a charge as long. The originals finally gave up a month ago. I needed another one and the XR was the logical choice. It's a great battery!
customer_reviews.author: MRDUCKS

customer_reviews.title: Just as Ordered
customer_reviews.text: Not many stores carry the 9.6 battery any more. This was a DeWalt product that fitted my needs just right. Arrived as scheduled and after a charge up has proceeded to perform as specified.
customer_reviews.author: John M. Eldredge

customer_reviews.title: all was good, product delivered quickly and was the correct
customer_reviews.text: all was good , product delivered quickly and was the correct part
customer_reviews.author: Joe H Bond

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace the original one that came with the drill. Perfect replacement and works well. Quick shipment.
customer_reviews.author: GB - NY

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt DW9061 9.6 volt battery
customer_reviews.text: Works good for a 9 volt battery. They all quickly develop a short life. I will get a high power drill next time instead of a battery
customer_reviews.author: Jimmee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: worked perfect for my dewalt drill, brought my drill back to life
customer_reviews.author: michael and sandra

customer_reviews.title: Short Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: I bought this battery with the expectation I would pay top $ for a 'name' brand. It died almost immediately after the 1 year warranty ran out. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Dismayed Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Everything it say's is true.
customer_reviews.text: Got the Battery on time, packed well. Charged it right away,put it on my Sander and it work's great. I now know just where to buy them when needed. The price was very reasonable. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Bogs

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for my drill
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement for my drill. The box box stores charge $50-60 IF they carry in stock. The XRP means the batteries have a higher mAH rating for longer use before it reeds recharging. I looked at replacing individual cells via a kit but WHY mess with soldering or taking the battery apart when you can just buy a new one with a FACTORY WARRANTY?
customer_reviews.author: S. Crandall

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt Battery
customer_reviews.text: Everything seems to be A+. Battery works just find after I charged it. I don"t have any trouble ordering at Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Discover

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I should have checked my drill before ordering the 9.6 volt. I should have gone with the 12 volt which should last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald L. Young Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lasted over a year, but not nearly as long as my original battery.
customer_reviews.author: Matt S.

product_meta.title: DEWALT XRP Battery, NiCd, 9.6-Volt, 1.7-Ah (DW9061)
product_meta.description:
The product is easy to use and easy to handle. The product is highly durable. This product is made of high quality material.

AMAZON.COM
Keep your DEWALT 9.6-volt cordless tools powered with the DC9091 XR NiCad pod-style battery pack. DEWALT uses top quality NiCad cells, offering a consistent and adaptable performance. The effective DEWALT high power batteries deliver a 25 percent longer lifespan than compact batteries with 1,200 recharges.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Pump up the power to your 9.6-volt DEWALT tools with the DW9061 battery pack. This small but impressive power source possesses 25% more run time than compact batteries of the same voltage. This NiCad battery will power the entire line of DEWALT 9.6-volt tools (except Univolt tools), allowing you to run multiple tools off the same pack. It’s backed by DEWALT’s 90-day money-back guarantee, one-year free service contract, and three-year limited warranty.

See more
feature_bullets: The product is easy to use and easy to handle
This product is made of high quality material
Keeps tools running, eliminating lost time on the jobsite
Powers entire DEWALT line of 9.6-volt tools except Univolt tools
Allows users to run multiple tools off of the same battery pack
DEWALT high-power batteries deliver a 25 percent longer lifespan than compact batteries with 1,200 recharges
90-day money-back guarantee, one-year free service contract, three-year limited warranty.
